**You can register for the WEHC by clicking [here](https://registration.invajo.com/53381b6c-69cf-43db-9688-47716a910d90?page=b9fd1835-a58b-4fda-85a3-de6548dec209).**

When you register, the fees will first appear without 25% VAT, which will be added later during the registration process. The table below presents the approximate prices with VAT and the deadlines for Early Bird and Regular fees.
